header.title: Blockchain solution for charitable donations that aims to increase transparency and reinforce trust back to the people
header.subtitle: A global ecosystem for charitable causes, based on blockchain technology, to improve and expand the existing fundraising processes, advance their efficiency and real-time transparency, resulting in the increase of trust and in public welfare improvement.

lastProjects.title: Last projects
lastProjects.subtitle: Learn more about charity projects and donate for a good cause.

description.title: Charity DAO
description.text1: Community is the core of the CHERR.IO platform and is the reason why we built such mechanisms to promote charitable giving.
description.text2:
We recognize online social networking activities as fundamental to building a presence online and reaching out to people. Word spreads fast and far on the Internet, and to motivate our community for active participation, we have decided to gamify the social activities of our user base and attribute points. We call this mechanism Proof of Charity.
Proof of Charity is the most important part of the whole CHERR.IO platform, because it serves as a basis for all other mechanisms built on top of it. As such, it is the driving force behind the community, and a feature that fundamentally challenges the current operational structure of charitable organizations. It is a new way of reaching out to society and asking for help, i.e. a way of leveraging the power of community to expand
itself. It makes advertising and the resulting heavy costs obsolete because it tasks the community with that job. Since advertising costs have a severe impact on the budgets of charities, using the CHERR.IO platform to drastically reduce these costs can result in more funds going to the people who need them the most.

problemAndSolution.title: Problem & Solution
problemAndSolution.subtitle: At vero eos et accusamus et iusto odio dignissimos ducimus qui blan ditiis praes entium volup tatum deleniti.

problem.title: Problem
problem.subtitle: Centralize Network
problem.text1: There’s still low trust/high doubt concerning charity sector
problem.text2: No real transparency of where the funds go and how successful was the project
problem.text3: Slow and expensive execution of donations and other charity activities
problem.text4: High organizational and marketing fees for NGOs
problem.text5: There is no privacy & anonymity of the donors, personal data shared with third parties
problem.text6: Fake news increase in the media
problem.text7: Besides being too centralized, current web3 solutions are mostly not led by, nor designed with the community
problem.text8: The solutions are still quite basic and merely enable crypto payments

solution.title: Solution
solution.subtitle: Centralize Network
solution.text1: Bringing charity to the Web3 Ecosystem and exploiting its every opportunity to expand donation streams
solution.text3: Individuals are empowered and incentivized to maintain the system and help through direct ownership, and are rewarded for participation
solution.text4: Secure, immutable, censorship resistant, scalable & accessible »on-chain« donations and charity statistics
solution.text7: Interoperable multi-chain ecosystem  featuring a program of incentives for active participation from the community that will facilitate organic growth of the platform

topFeatures.title: CHERR.IO's top features
topFeatures.subtitle: A global ecosystem exploiting every opportunity that Web3 has to offer.

text1.title: Distributed Ledger Technology
text1.subtitle:
Software Development Kit 
SDK provided for easy integration as an added value service of web3 projects

text2.title: Proof of charity - Rewarding System
text2.subtitle: Sharing projects on social networks creating community effect and organic marketing

text3.title: Voting Mechanism
text3.subtitle: Give people the decision power back to their hands, where it belongs (DAO)

text4.title: NFTs
text4.subtitle: Each donation project created as an NFT collection

text5.title: Charity Market Cap
text5.subtitle: Database of registered charities and their projects’ history and statistics will serve as a source of trusted information (trust score)

text6.title: Metaverse
text6.subtitle: Endless opportunities for charity: use case showing, fundraising events, promotion, dcommerce (D2A), play-to-(l)earn etc.
